resources.string: Like a password, this backup phrase is the only way to recover a Hedera Wallet. Save the backup phrases to recover your Hedera Wallet if it is deleted, lost, or you get a new phone. It is recommended to also save your accountID along with these 24 words.
Enter, in order, the 22 or 24 words you were given when you created your previous wallet account. You will be prompted to enter the account id in next step.
If you already know the account number enter here or visit hedera portal to get it. You can skip this step and change it later in Accounts menu.
Your old backup-phrase is being replaced with a new 24-word equivalent. Tap here to see that phrase - Make sure you keep a record.
Your 22 words passphrase is deprecated and will not be supported in future wallet. Please save this new backup phrases to recover your Hedera Wallet
Your account info is copied successfully"
A new fingerprint was added to this device, so your password is required.
PLEASE CONFIRM THAT THE PROVIDED NAME MATCHES ACCOUNT ADDRESS
You have already enabled Fingerprint ID
